Flow freely and let your inner goddess come alive, in our handmade, timeless, ethical pieces.

settings.title: Effortless Beauty
settings.text: Inspired by the free spirited travellers, the great lovers, the flowing dancers, the loud laughers, the kind hearted carers of the world.

settings.subtitle: Why choose us?
settings.title: Explain your brand philosophy
settings.text: Use this section to explain your company philosophy or standards. Showcase lifestyle photography for added emphasis. This content will appear on all products.

settings.title: Testimonials
settings.testimonial_1: Add customer reviews and testimonials to showcase your store’s happy customers and to provide social proof.
settings.testimonial_2: Add customer reviews and testimonials to showcase your store’s happy customers and to provide social proof.

settings.subheading: Iincredibly talented hand block artists in India who make each piece and carry through this traditional form of Indian hand block printing.

settings.title: Our Conscious Approach
settings.text: We are fair trade and work with our team in India on programs that build education and training for the people of the village and surrounding areas of Jaipur, India.

settings.popup_text: Entice customers to sign up for your mailing list with discounts or exclusive offers. Include an image for extra impact.

settings.textarea: Include the smaller details of your promotion in text below the title.

settings.testimonial:
A dress with a story
I confess that at the beginning I was charmed by “the story behind the dress” and give it a try. It’ s beautiful and feminine. I’ ll definitely buy more in the future.
settings.author: Diana Banescu, Italy

settings.testimonial:
Gorgeous dress!
The Kyra Midi is just beautiful and looks great layered & with boots as we change seasons. I love the volume of the fabric, especially the gathering at the back, and the length of the dress. The fact these garments are ethically made is great!
settings.author: Paula Davidson, Australia

settings.testimonial:
The most beautiful piece of clothing I own
MY GOODNESS. This dress is worth every single penny. I have never felt more beautiful and feminine in my life. It is so lightweight, flowy, and just down right stunning. It also...read more
settings.author: Savanna

settings.testimonial:
Love these dresses
Wonderful. I can’t say enough about how much I love their dresses and their customer service.
settings.author: Gabriella H

settings.testimonial:
Best summer dresses
I live in Texas and feel like I’m constantly having to choose between being too hot and wearing cute, well-made clothes. I am so in love with these dresses because they are light-weight and well made. I’m so excited to look cute this summer!
settings.author: Rosalee G, United States

settings.title: Hand block printed
settings.text: An ancient craft that has been passed down through generations, keeping this masterpiece art-form alive, one beautiful garment at a time.

settings.title: Our Ethical Journey
settings.text: Our ethical and sustainable journey began at the conception of Daughters of India. It was an experience of precious moments with our friends in India, ensuring that we were creating a slow fashion label, with the highest ethical practices and support for the artisans and makers.
Effortless Beauty ~ Inspired by the free spirited travellers, the great lovers, the flowing dancers, the loud laughers, the kind hearted carers of the world.
Free shipping
Hassle-free returns
